A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well worth the wait. I understand why the \"hardcore fans\" are a little peeved about this film as it's  without a doubt a different flavour to the other moivies. It's had a bit too much of the \"Disney magic\" applied (casino) that needs to be tamed in later releases. But all in all a good film well worth the wait..... Only bit that wound me up a bit after really thinking about it is that the empire need to invest in better engines! (Watch to find out what I mean)....... Still loved it :)
